title: Should I Go Back to School?
description:
Katie will be a college sophomore this fall if she goes back to school, but she's reluctant since becoming comfortable at home during the shutdown. - Dr. Laura: "Facing life's challenges is how you grow and get stronger."

How has the shutdown shifted your education or work priorities? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
